Blog.post: Ok This might be a bit of a heavy start to my blog, but I really didn't want to start with a stupid "first post yay!" kind of thing. anyway this is an email I sent to "Helga the help" the resident concerning the replies she/he got from a newsletter concerning Islamic people. urlLink I sent helga an email telling him/her my thoughts on religion, and helga was cool enough to reply :). anyway I just thought you might want to read it. note: I am not a racist, I only hate all religions :) -----Original Message----- From: sporadicmedia [mailto:pevee@sporadicmedia.com] Sent: Saturday, May 15, 2004 7:12 AM To: helga@liquidgeneration.com Subject: islamic people are stupid!+my thoughts on religion http://www.liquidgeneration.com/helga/?st=8 These letters are just a prime example of how stupid Islamic people are. The world would be a better place without religion. All religion is based on fear, "if you don't believe you will burn in hell". People cant sort out there own problems so they turn to a church or other religious house of damnation and get told what to think, and how to live there life's. To me that is so wrong. I myself was forced into the catholic faith when I was barely out of my soiled nappies. Another person deciding that there child should be involved in a religion before they can even speak is bullshit. I was taught that this was what I should believe in and how I should live my life. I was being lied to. Ever since I realised I could be in control of my life, and I researched the catholic faith, coming to the realisation that I did not believe in some of the Catholic Church's ethics and greatly disagreed with parts of it. So now I Type as a happy atheist, knowing I can live my life the way I want it as a good respectable citizen of the UK. Don't even get me started with the rest of those cults, err, I mean religions. So that's my 2 cents, whether you wanted it or not. Steven McVeigh, 15 , United Kingdom after a few days of thinking that I wasn't going to get one, I received a reply Hi Steven! Thanks for your input! I hope that the extremists that draw their arbitrary line in the sand simply so they can have something to believe and someone to hate will soon be marginalized into the bowels of history along with the Roman Empire. Unfortunately, unlike the Romans, who, for all of their flaws, presided over one of the greatest expansions in military evolution, the fundamentalists have not really had a single worthy contribution or single original thought for which we will remember them. If the "15" after your name is your age then I must admit to more than a little jealousy because when I was 15, I still believed everything people told me. More power to you.
